title: Hanamaru’s Surprise!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Rin-chan, here, I brought the book that we talked about the other day. Maru also loves this book a lot, so to have Rin-chan be interested in it is nice♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hanamaru-chan, Rin has something too! Here, look!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh….? What is this? A bento box?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Open it open it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>O-, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Waa-!!! A-, amazing….! Rin-chan! This bento, it looks just like the one that this book’s protagonist gave to their best friend-zura!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~. Umm, actually, Rin already read that book. Then Rin thought “Rin wants to make a bento just like this one and give it to Hanamaru-chan”. But, Rin isn’t good at cooking, so Rin had Kayochin and Nico-chan help Rin make it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeeeeh~~~~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin only helped pack it, but Rin made sure to put a lot of my gratitude for Rin’s beloved Hanamaru-chan nya-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Rin-chan, I’m so happy!! Thank you-zura~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
